features: HYDRATE YOUR SKIN: Unlike other regular bar soap that can dry out skin, Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar deeply cleans and hydrates skin, leaving skin feeling smooth and comfortable
FROM THE #1 DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED MEN’S BRAND: This face and body bar is formulated with more moisturizer than ordinary soap bar and washes off easily to leave skin feeling healthy
3 IN 1 FOR BAR CLEANSER FOR BODY, FACE, AND SHAVING: Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face bar formulation is so hydrating and gentle on skin that you can also use it to wash your face or to shave
REFRESHING CLEAN: Feel clean and invigorated with this hydrating body cleanser and face bar and enjoy its crisp, refreshing scent of Mandarin Citrus, Patchouli, and Rosemary
DESIGNED FOR MEN: Men’s skin care is different. Men sweat more, have thicker skin and lose hydration faster. Dove Men+Care is specifically developed for men’s skin to protect it against skin dryness
PLEDGE FOR PATERNITY: From the #1 dermatologist recommended men’s brand, we're committed to making paid paternity leave the new standard
body.description: Product Description Looking for a bar that cleans thoroughly and leaves skin feeling refreshed, hydrated and invigorated? Try Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar. Unlike regular bar soap for men that can dry skin out, this Dove Men+Care Bar is uniquely formulated for men’s skin with ¼ moisturizing cream and nourishes for skin that feels healthy and strong, while also delivering a fresh clean. The Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar has an invigorating and fresh scent and delivers refreshment and total skin comfort. Suitable for use on both the body and face, this #1 Dermatologist recommended Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Bar is noncomedogenic and rinses off easily, leaving skin feeling healthy and strong. This body bar is clinically proven to fight skin dryness, and will not only clean but also help your skin feel soft and smooth. To use Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar, wet the body bar in the shower and massage bar over your skin before rinsing thoroughly. The non-greasy foaming lather will provide a comfortable, refreshing clean, and rinses away easily. Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar is an invigorating body bar with a patented design cleans your skin and feels better than regular soap. Brand Story By Dove

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar delivers a deep, refreshing clean and intense hydration. Unlike other ordinary bar soaps that can dry out skin, our 3-in-1 body, face, shaving bar is formulated with more moisturizer to leave skin healthy, smooth, and comfortable.

Refreshing Clean Feel clean and invigorated with this hydrating body and face bar and enjoy its crisp, refreshing scent of Mandarin Citrus, Patchouli, and Rosemary. #1 Dermatologist Recommended Men’s Brand This body and face bar is specifically designed for men to deeply cleanse and hydrate skin, leaving it feeling healthy, smooth, and comfortable. 3-In-1 For Body, Face, And Shaving Formulated with more moisturizer than ordinary bar soap and soap-based shaving products, this bar is hydrating and gentle enough to be used on the face and for shaving. Real Strength Is Cruelty-Free Dove is proud to be certified cruelty-free by PETA­—globally, Dove does not test on animals.

Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Wash Pump Dove Men+Care 2 in1 Fresh and Clean Shampoo and Conditioner Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Dry Spray Antiperspirant (2 Count) Main Benefit An invigorating body and face wash in an easy-to-use pump bottle This foaming body wash instantly hydrates skin and rinses away easily A refreshing antiperspirant spray that fights sweat and body odor for up to 48 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality . Non irratiating
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Great scent and does not leave residue like some soaps. Lasts a while and does and is a good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought this soap over and over again. The soap is moisturising and feels great on the body. it easily suds up and has an incredible smell. It’s great value for money. I’m so glad I can find it online as it’s not possible to find in Hong Kong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is great body soap ever !!!
reviews.reviewText: It was first time to met with this product when I got it as gift from my friend. Actually, I didn't like bar soap til then. But I changed my mind since I use it. I tried same soap for liquid one, but I feel bar soap is better than liquid. Great scent, last long and great refresh skin.I highly recommend this product if you are looking for new great soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisture galore + fab manly scent!
reviews.reviewText: This product is just as wonderful as the original. Creamy, soothing and easily rinse away without a film. These bars along with the original, do get used up quickly(twice as fast as regular bars of soap). Your choice. Longer lasting bars or intense moisture and clean rinse away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bar soap!
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent and the size an shape. Shape is good, it's molded so you can grip ti comfortably - curved outward on one sice and inward on the other. May not be comfortable gripping if you have little hands but you can just cup either side easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price compare to in store
reviews.reviewText: I already purchase this product from Walmart. So it was great to see it for a better price. They are occasional deals on them, or the subscrip and save feature is great too. The bar itself, smells great, lathers well, and last good a amount of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets one clean but doesn't dry out skin too much. Great scent.
reviews.reviewText: This bar soap is great to get you clean, but it doesn't dry out the skin like other soaps. I like it, especially in the winter when your skin is susceptible to drying out. It also leaves a clean scent, but not to overwhelming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good alternative now that lever changed their formula and is so nasty
reviews.reviewText: was a lever 2000 man for a long time, then they changed the recipe and the smell was nasty, the bars cracked, etc. i am not the only one, lots of feedback on their site but apparently they have decided to stick with that bad decision.so many like me decided to switch. this is a nice moisturizing bar, smells like it smells, it's not bad. they do go pretty fast, say a bar a week taking 1-2 showers a day.but yeah if you are still old school and use bars of soap and liked lever 2000, it's a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I was very frustrated with this company as the shipping was slow. I wrote to them and inquired where my order was and received a good explanation as to what was happening. I was surprised at the quick response I got and was impressed that it was written from the Owner, (I think) of the company. After reading the note, I understood and let the order come. It is nice to have this product as I am use to buying this for use in the States. It is something from home while Im living in the UK. Great service from this company and would order again. Thanks.
